archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.4.4g: g) details about information security incidents experienced, including assessment of business impact, root cause analysis (to identify control weaknesses) and forensic investigation (where applicable)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
